urlData.desc: Instead of just using HTML5's built-in browser validation, I add additional custom rules to check the inputted value as well. It's a real-time validation using test() method to test for a match in RegExp, the feedback is displayed without submitting the form.
urlData.title: HTML5 Form Validation with jQuery

urlData.desc: Use css property 'mix-blend-mode' for having a transparent text with its own background.

urlData.desc: I build a rough sample adventrue blog for practice with the latest HTML5 and CSS3 features.
urlData.title: 04-html5blog

urlData.desc: A CSS Only animation with a simple character sprite sheet and steps() to run the frame-by-frame effect.
